entry.def: If you describe someone as merciless, you mean that they are very cruel or determined and do not show any concern for the effect their actions have on other people.

example.tran: 和以往一样，惠斯勒还是那么冷酷无情。

example.ex: ...the merciless efficiency of a modern police state.
example.tran: 现代极权国家残酷无情、只讲效率
